title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.6 - Current list of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.6 - Current list of records

State Regulations

The following is a current list by subject matter of records
which shall be produced, filed or first kept or promulgated, for public
inspection and copying, commencing September 1, 1974: (a) Final opinions, including concurring and
dissenting opinions, as well as orders, made in the adjudication of
cases; (b) Those statements of
policy and interpretations which have been adopted by CDTA or any of its
subsidiaries and any documents, memoranda, data, or other materials
constituting statistical or factual tabulations which led to the formulation
thereof; (c) Minutes of meetings of
the governing bodies of CDTA and its subsidiaries and of public hearings held
by CDTA and its subsidiaries; (d) Internal or external audits and statistical or factual tabulations made by or
for the CDTA or its subsidiaries; (e) Administrative staff manuals and
instructions to staff that affect members of the public; (f) An itemized record setting forth name, address, title and salary of every officer or employee shall be compiled by
each fiscal officer charged with the duty of preparing payrolls for such
officers and such records shall be made available for inspection by the officer
charged with the duty of certifying such payrolls to bona fide members of the
news media on a form to be prescribed by the Comptroller of the State of a
notice which shall be requested with particularity; such records to be
inspected under the supervision of the comptroller of the Capital District

Transportation Authority and in the place aforesaid on Thursdays which are
working days between the hours of 9:30 and 12 noon; (g) Final determinations and dissenting
opinions of members of the CDTA and its subsidiaries; (h) Those reports which are filed by the CDTA
and/or its subsidiaries with the Department of Audit and Control and the

Department of Transportation and such other similar files, records, papers or
documents required by any provision of the law to be made available for public
inspection and copying; (i) A record
of the final vote of each member of the CDTA or any subsidiary in each
proceeding in which the member voted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1500.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
